mapper.update: update mountains set mImageUrl=#{imageURL} where mcode=#{code}
update mountains set is_famous=0 where mcode=#{code}
mapper.select: select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where is_Famous = 0 and mImageUrl is not null limit #{size}, 10
select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where maddress like concat(#{city},'%')
select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where mheight between 1 and 300 and mImageUrl is not null limit #{size}, 10
select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where mheight > 700 and mImageUrl is not null limit #{size}, 10
select mcode from mountains where mname = #{name}
select maddress from mountains where mname = #{name}
select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where mheight between 1 and 150 and mImageUrl is not null limit #{size}, 10
select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where mdetail like '%가을%' and mImageUrl is not null limit #{size}, 10
select mcode, mname, mheight, maddress, mmanagement, mdetail, msummary, mImageUrl, is_Famous from mountains where mdetail like '%인기%' and mImageUrl is not null limit #{size}, 10
